welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mamak, Turkey! Get ready to experience the unique charm of this bustling city, known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mamak has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Etimesgut Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Etimesgut Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic flights within Turkey.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
